definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: Historically, most societies granted rights only to the lucky few.
sentences.chinese: 回顧歷史，大多數社會只讓極少數幸運者享有權利。

sentences.english: History says that banks bounce back from legal problems.
sentences.chinese: 回顧歷史，大多銀行能從法律糾紛中重振雄風。

sentences.english: Throughout history, many agrarian cultures have celebrated end-of-harvest festivals.
sentences.chinese: 回顧歷史，許多農耕文化都有慶祝豐收節的傳統。

sentences.english: Looking at history again suggests an answer.
sentences.chinese: 回顧歷史，答案就在其中。

sentences.english: Therefore, in retrospect, we can conclude that Zhang Renjie was a man of vision.
sentences.chinese: 回顧歷史，張人傑是一位有遠見的人。

sentences.english: But it is hard, also, to think of a parallel in history.
sentences.chinese: 回顧歷史，也很難找到與此相似的情境了。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1

definition: amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
lit. to fix the tone with a single hammer blow/fig. to make the final decision
